content.rendered:
Behold, the magic of Color Morph! 🪄

When ordering stickers with our Color Morph material, there are a couple things to consider first before going forward with this option!

It’s Morphin’ Time!

This material has two different color states! The material’s warm state (the usual color that it will be seen with if you live some place mostly warm!) is a vibrant pink, and when the material gets below 59°F, it begins to change color to its cold state of an electric purple.

Sticker Design Feedback!!
Color Morph works the absolute best with art that contains white lines vs black! In our sticker opinion, we suggest avoiding black and darker colors with this material, as when the sticker enters its cold state, the darker colors can become almost completely lost. The white lines create more contrast and make for a more aesthetically pleasing sticker! See below for examples!

Please note: If the submitted artwork contains black lines, there’s a very good chance we can easily convert them to white lines on our end using Illustrator magic! We’ll reach out via email if we need anything else! 🙂

Head’s up that even the white ink gets affected by the color morph material! White ink layers still take on the color of the vinyl it’s being printed on. Because of this, we’re unable to achieve a true white with this material! The colors below are screenshots from areas that had only white ink on them. As you can see, there’s a bit of pink/purple tint to these whites! 

Color Morph Vinyl Uses

There’s so many possibilities with this type of vinyl! Let your creativity run wild! 🌟

The most popular surfaces to stick these on are:

• Non-Insulated Water Bottles 💧
• Outsides of Vehicles 🚗
• Anything that Dictates Temperature 🌡️

Help!

Need help with designing the white ink layer? We’ve got you covered! Simply select the “I’d like a designer to do it!” option on the ordering page for this material.

Uploading artwork that is on a transparent PNG helps us out so much!!! Once we check out your uploaded artwork, we may reach back out for any additional edits to make your stickers perfect! 😊

Unsure about how your art might translate on this material? Feel free to email us at support@stickerninja.com with your art file, and our sticker experts will be able to help provide feedback! 😀
